hey,

for the mechanism conversion, you'll need to use ck2cti file 
conversion utility
you'll be able to find it under
c:\>my documents\cantera\bin
under the same path store your chemkin mechanism files
and then write the following line at the command prompt
ck2cti -i (mechanism file) -t (thermal file) -tr (transport file)

the output would be a (mechanism).cti file

you'll need to reinstall the latest version cantera 1.6.0 for 
converting ..

I was having problems with the older version with the transport 
file included while converting..that seems to have been fixed 
now!

Hope that helps.

Good luck,

Bhupinder
